name: Cyber Hentai
description:
Cyber Hentai is an action-adventure game set in the city of the future. Androids have gone crazy and you need to deal with it. Use your Arsenal of weapons to clear the city. Enjoy the driving music and the atmosphere of cyberpunk.

Key Features


  • Dynamic gameplay
  • Futuristic city
  • Cool music
  • Machine gun, pistol, sniper rifle and dangerous enemies!
